assets.strContent:
“The program of content required a mobile-first authoring platform with the flexibility to provide a truly customized look and feel, one that provides an engaging experience for our learners... Gomo was the tool that meant this could happen.”
[b]Karina Chiechi, Learning & Development Manager Godiva Americas[/b]

"People prefer courses authored in Gomo over previous versions of those courses. We've seen an increase in completion rates since moving to Gomo. Our courses can now be completed on mobiles and tablets, which is a huge win for us. It looks great on every device."
[b]Alejandro del Mazo Alonso, Rentokil Initial's U+ Content Developer[/b]

"Our trainers are saying that, with Gomo, it's so easy to know what to access on a content level. We can give people content that's relevant to them, whether they're in a retail or call center environment, or anywhere else. Using Gomo allows us to bring out the best from a cosmetic point of view, with beautiful backgrounds, page assets, and pop-ups. It's made a massive difference."
[b]Dharmesh Chauhan, Senior Online L&D Consultant for Client Sales[/b]

“Using Gomo to host and deliver the project ensured that no part of the ambitious design had to be compromised. We now have an experience that used all the right methods to deliver critical learning messages in the best way and in the best possible context.”
[b]Richard Pedley, Fidelity International UK's Learning Project Manager[/b]
Global organizations choose Gomo to empower their workforce
